info.title: Open Mercato API
info.description: Auto-generated OpenAPI document for all enabled modules.

get.description:
Returns the saved widget layout together with the widgets the current user is allowed to place.

Requires features: dashboards.view

200.description: Current dashboard layout and available widgets.

put.description:
Saves the provided widget ordering, sizes, and settings for the current user.

Requires features: dashboards.configure

requestBody.description: List of dashboard widgets with ordering, sizing, and settings.

get.summary: Fetch widget assignments for a role
get.description:
Returns the widgets explicitly assigned to the given role together with the evaluation scope.

Requires features: dashboards.admin.assign-widgets

200.description: Current widget configuration for the role.

put.summary: Update widgets assigned to a role
put.description:
Persists the widget list for a role within the provided tenant and organization scope.

Requires features: dashboards.admin.assign-widgets

requestBody.description: Role identifier, optional scope, and the widget ids that should remain assigned.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/dashboards/roles/widgets" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "roleId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": null,
  "organizationId": null,
  "widgetIds": []
}'

get.summary: Read widget overrides for a user
get.description:
Returns the widgets inherited and explicitly configured for the requested user within the current scope.

Requires features: dashboards.admin.assign-widgets

put.description:
Sets the widget override mode and allowed widgets for a user. Passing `mode: inherit` clears overrides.

Requires features: dashboards.admin.assign-widgets

requestBody.description: User identifier, optional scope, override mode, and widget ids.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/dashboards/users/widgets" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "userId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": null,
  "organizationId": null,
  "mode": "inherit",
  "widgetIds": []
}'

patch.description:
Adjusts the size or settings for a single widget within the dashboard layout.

Requires features: dashboards.configure

requestBody.description: Payload containing the new size or settings for the widget.

400.description: Invalid payload or missing item id

get.description:
Returns the catalog of widgets that modules expose, including defaults and feature requirements.

Requires features: dashboards.admin.assign-widgets

Returns the feature and organization assignments associated with a role within the current tenant.

Requires features: auth.acl.manage

put.description:
Replaces the feature list, super admin flag, and optional organization assignments for a role.

Requires features: auth.acl.manage

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/auth/roles/acl" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "roleId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "organizations": null
}'

get.description:
Returns available roles within the current tenant. Super administrators receive visibility across tenants.

Requires features: auth.roles.list

post.description:
Creates a new role for the current tenant or globally when `tenantId` is omitted.

Requires features: auth.roles.manage

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/auth/roles" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "name": "string",
  "tenantId": null
}'

put.description:
Updates mutable fields on an existing role.

Requires features: auth.roles.manage

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/auth/roles" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes a role by identifier. Fails when users remain assigned.

Requires features: auth.roles.manage

get.description: Returns personal sidebar customization and any role-level preferences the user can manage.

put.description: Updates personal sidebar configuration and, optionally, applies the same settings to selected roles.

get.description:
Returns custom ACL overrides for a user within the current tenant, if any.

Requires features: auth.acl.manage

put.description:
Configures per-user ACL overrides, including super admin access, feature list, and organization scope.

Requires features: auth.acl.manage

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/auth/users/acl" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "userId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "organizations": null
}'

get.description:
Returns users for the current tenant. Super administrators may scope the response via organization or role filters.

Requires features: auth.users.list

post.description:
Creates a new confirmed user within the specified organization and optional roles.

Requires features: auth.users.create

put.description:
Updates profile fields, organization assignment, credentials, or role memberships.

Requires features: auth.users.edit

delete.description:
Deletes a user by identifier. Undo support is provided via the command bus.

Requires features: auth.users.delete

get.description: Returns the backend navigation tree available to the authenticated administrator after applying role and personal sidebar preferences.

post.summary: Check feature grants for the current user
post.description: Evaluates which of the requested features are available to the signed-in user within the active tenant / organization context.

requestBody.description: Feature identifiers to evaluate.

get.description:
Returns all static features contributed by the enabled modules along with their module source.

Requires features: auth.acl.manage

post.description: Validates the submitted credentials and issues a bearer token cookie for subsequent API calls.

requestBody.description: Form-encoded payload captured from the login form.

get.description: For convenience, the GET variant performs the same logout logic as POST and issues a redirect.

302.description: Redirect to login after successful logout

post.description: Clears authentication cookies and redirects the browser to the login page.

302.description: Redirect to login after successful logout

post.description: Validates the reset token and updates the user password.
Requests a password reset email for the given account. The endpoint always returns `ok: true` to avoid leaking account existence.

200.description: Reset email dispatched (or ignored for unknown accounts)

get.summary: Refresh auth cookie from session token
get.description: Exchanges an existing `session_token` cookie for a fresh JWT auth cookie and redirects the browser.

302.description: Redirect to target location when session is valid

get.description: Returns the hierarchical menu of organizations the current user may switch to within the active tenant.

Returns organizations using options, tree, or paginated manage view depending on the `view` parameter.

Requires features: directory.organizations.view

200.description: Organization data for the requested view.

post.description:
Creates a new organization within a tenant and optionally assigns hierarchy relationships.

Requires features: directory.organizations.manage

requestBody.description: Organization attributes and optional hierarchy configuration.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/directory/organizations" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "name": "string",
  "parentId": null
}'

put.description:
Updates organization details and hierarchy assignments.

Requires features: directory.organizations.manage

requestBody.description: Organization identifier followed by fields to update.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/directory/organizations" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "parentId": null
}'

delete.description:
Soft deletes an organization identified by id.

Requires features: directory.organizations.manage

requestBody.description: Identifier of the organization to delete.

get.description:
Returns tenants visible to the current user with optional search and pagination.

Requires features: directory.tenants.view

post.description:
Creates a new tenant and returns its identifier.

Requires features: directory.tenants.manage

requestBody.description: Tenant name and optional activation flag.

put.description:
Updates tenant properties such as name or activation state.

Requires features: directory.tenants.manage

requestBody.description: Tenant identifier with fields to update.

delete.description:
Soft deletes the tenant identified by id.

Requires features: directory.tenants.manage

requestBody.description: Identifier of the tenant to remove.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of activitys scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.activities.view

post.description:
Creates a timeline activity linked to an entity or deal.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a timeline activity linked to an entity or deal.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/activities" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "entityId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "activityType": "string",
  "appearanceIcon": null,
  "appearanceColor": null
}'

put.description:
Updates subject, body, scheduling, or custom fields for an existing activity.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Updates subject, body, scheduling, or custom fields for an existing activity.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/activities" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "appearanceIcon": null,
  "appearanceColor": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes an activity identified by `id`. Accepts id via body or query string.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes an activity identified by `id`. Accepts id via body or query string.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of addresss scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.activities.view

post.description:
Creates a customer address record and associates it with the referenced entity.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a customer address record and associates it with the referenced entity.

put.description:
Updates fields on an existing customer address.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Updates fields on an existing customer address.

delete.description:
Deletes an address by id. The identifier may be included in the body or query.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes an address by id. The identifier may be included in the body or query.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of comments scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.activities.view

post.description:
Adds a comment to a customer timeline.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Adds a comment to a customer timeline.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/comments" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "entityId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "body": "string",
  "appearanceIcon": null,
  "appearanceColor": null
}'

put.description:
Updates an existing timeline comment.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Updates an existing timeline comment.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/comments" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "appearanceIcon": null,
  "appearanceColor": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes a comment identified by `id` supplied via body or query string.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes a comment identified by `id` supplied via body or query string.

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of companies scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.companies.view

post.description:
Creates a company record and associated profile data.

Requires features: customers.companies.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a company record and associated profile data.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/companies" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "displayName": "string",
  "nextInteraction": null
}'

put.description:
Updates company profile fields, tags, or custom attributes.

Requires features: customers.companies.manage

requestBody.description: Updates company profile fields, tags, or custom attributes.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/companies" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "nextInteraction": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes a company by id. The identifier can be provided via body or query.

Requires features: customers.companies.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes a company by id. The identifier can be provided via body or query.

get.description:
Returns the most recently created todo links for display on dashboards.

Requires features: dashboards.view, customers.widgets.todos

Returns the latest customers created within the scoped tenant/organization for dashboard display.

Requires features: dashboards.view, customers.widgets.new-customers

Lists upcoming (or optionally past) customer interaction reminders ordered by interaction date.

Requires features: dashboards.view, customers.widgets.next-interactions

Returns a paginated collection of deals scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.deals.view

post.description:
Creates a sales deal, optionally associating people and companies.

Requires features: customers.deals.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a sales deal, optionally associating people and companies.

put.description:
Updates pipeline position, metadata, or associations for an existing deal.

Requires features: customers.deals.manage

requestBody.description: Updates pipeline position, metadata, or associations for an existing deal.

delete.description:
Deletes a deal by `id`. The identifier may be provided in the body or query parameters.

Requires features: customers.deals.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes a deal by `id`. The identifier may be provided in the body or query parameters.

get.description:
Returns the active currency dictionary for the current organization scope, falling back to shared entries when required.

Requires features: customers.people.view

Performs an exact digits comparison (stripping non-numeric characters) to determine whether a customer contact matches the provided phone fragment.

Requires features: customers.people.view

Returns a paginated collection of people scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.people.view

post.description:
Creates a person contact using scoped organization and tenant identifiers.

Requires features: customers.people.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a person contact using scoped organization and tenant identifiers.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/people" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "nextInteraction": null,
  "firstName": "string",
  "lastName": "string"
}'

put.description:
Updates contact details or custom fields for a person.

Requires features: customers.people.manage

requestBody.description: Updates contact details or custom fields for a person.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/customers/people" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "nextInteraction": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes a person by id. Request body or query may provide the identifier.

Requires features: customers.people.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes a person by id. Request body or query may provide the identifier.

get.description:
Returns the current address formatting preference for the selected organization.

Requires features: customers.settings.manage

put.description:
Updates the address format preference for the selected organization.

Requires features: customers.settings.manage

post.description:
Links a tag to a customer entity within the validated tenant / organization scope.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

get.description:
Returns a paginated collection of tags scoped to the authenticated organization.

Requires features: customers.activities.view

post.description:
Creates a tag scoped to the current tenant and organization.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Creates a tag scoped to the current tenant and organization.

put.description:
Updates label, color, or description for an existing tag.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Updates label, color, or description for an existing tag.

delete.description:
Deletes a tag identified by `id`. The identifier may be provided via body or query string.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Deletes a tag identified by `id`. The identifier may be provided via body or query string.

post.description:
Detaches a tag from a customer entity within the validated tenant / organization scope.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

get.description:
Returns paginated todo link entries filtered by completion, search term, or entity.

Requires features: customers.activities.view

post.summary: Create todo and link to customer
post.description:
Creates a new todo (via the configured source entity) and links it to the specified customer record.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

put.description:
Links an existing todo record to a customer entity within the allowed scope.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

delete.description:
Removes the association between a todo and the specified customer.

Requires features: customers.activities.manage

requestBody.description: Provide the `id` of the link to remove. The value may also be passed via the `id` query parameter.

400.description: Invalid request or missing link id

get.description: Returns a company customer record with optional related resources such as addresses, comments, activities, deals, todos, and linked people.
Returns a deal with linked people, companies, custom fields, and viewer context.

patch.description:
Updates value, label, color, or icon for an existing customer dictionary entry.

Requires features: customers.settings.manage

delete.description:
Removes a customer dictionary entry by identifier.

Requires features: customers.settings.manage

get.description:
Returns the merged dictionary entries for the requested kind, including inherited values.

Requires features: customers.people.view

post.description:
Creates a dictionary entry (or updates the existing entry for the same value) within the current organization scope.

Requires features: customers.settings.manage

get.description: Returns a person customer record with optional related resources such as addresses, comments, activities, deals, and todos.

delete.description:
Removes a perspective owned by the current user for the given table.

Requires features: perspectives.use

delete.summary: Clear role perspectives for a table
delete.description:
Removes all role-level perspectives associated with the provided role identifier for the table.

Requires features: perspectives.role_defaults

get.description:
Returns personal perspectives and available role defaults for the requested table identifier.

Requires features: perspectives.use

post.description:
Saves a personal perspective and optionally applies the same configuration to selected roles.

Requires features: perspectives.use

requestBody.description: Perspective payload including optional role defaults.

400.description: Validation failed or invalid roles provided

post.description:
Creates or updates multiple definitions for a single entity in one transaction.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

get.description:
Returns scoped custom field definitions (including inactive tombstones) for administration interfaces.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

post.description:
Reactivates a previously soft-deleted definition within the current tenant/org scope.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

get.description: Returns active custom field definitions for the supplied entity ids, respecting tenant scope and tombstones.

post.description:
Creates or updates a custom field definition for the current tenant/org scope.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

delete.description:
Marks the specified definition inactive and tombstones it for the current scope.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

get.description: Returns generated and custom entities scoped to the caller with field counts per entity.

post.description:
Creates or updates a tenant/org scoped custom entity definition.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/entities/entities" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "entityId": "string",
  "label": "string",
  "description": null,
  "showInSidebar": false
}'

delete.description:
Marks the specified custom entity inactive within the current scope.

Requires features: entities.definitions.manage

get.description:
Returns paginated records for the supplied entity. Supports custom field filters, exports, and soft-delete toggles.

Requires features: entities.records.view

post.description:
Creates a record for the given entity. When `recordId` is omitted or not a UUID the data engine will generate one automatically.

Requires features: entities.records.manage

put.description:
Updates an existing record. If the provided recordId is not a UUID the record will be created instead to support optimistic flows.

Requires features: entities.records.manage

delete.description:
Soft deletes the specified record within the current tenant/org scope.

Requires features: entities.records.manage

400.description: Missing entity id or record id

get.description:
Returns up to 50 option entries for populating relation dropdowns, automatically resolving label fields when omitted.

Requires features: entities.definitions.view
Returns custom entities flagged with `showInSidebar` for the current tenant/org scope.
Requires features: configs.cache.view

post.description: Requires features: configs.cache.manage

get.description: Requires features: configs.system_status.view

post.description: Requires features: configs.manage

Queues a purge job to remove indexed records for an entity type within the active scope.

Requires features: query_index.purge

requestBody.description: Entity identifier whose index entries should be removed.

post.description:
Queues a reindex job for the specified entity type within the current tenant scope.

Requires features: query_index.reindex

requestBody.description: Entity identifier and optional force flag.

get.description:
Returns entity counts comparing base tables with the query index along with the latest job status.

Requires features: query_index.status.view
Requires features: vector.search

delete.description: Requires features: vector.manage

post.description: Requires features: vector.reindex

get.description: Requires features: vector.search
Requires features: vector.view

post.description: Requires features: vector.manage

get.description:
Fetches paginated access audit logs scoped to the authenticated user. Tenant administrators can optionally expand the search to other actors or organizations.

Requires features: audit_logs.view_self

post.description:
Redoes the latest undone command owned by the caller. Requires the action to still be eligible for redo within tenant and organization scope.

Requires features: audit_logs.redo_self

get.description:
Returns recent action audit log entries. Tenant administrators can widen the scope to other actors or organizations, and callers can optionally restrict results to undoable actions.

Requires features: audit_logs.view_self

post.description:
Replays the undo handler registered for a command. The provided undo token must match the latest undoable log entry accessible to the caller.

Requires features: audit_logs.undo_self

get.description:
Returns uploaded attachments for the given entity record, ordered by newest first.

Requires features: attachments.view

post.description:
Uploads a new attachment using multipart form-data and stores metadata for later retrieval.

Requires features: attachments.manage

get.description:
Manage sales channels to segment orders and pricing across marketplaces or stores.

Requires features: sales.channels.manage

post.description:
Creates a new sales channel.

Requires features: sales.channels.manage

requestBody.description: Payload describing the sales channel to create.

put.description:
Updates an existing sales channel by id.

Requires features: sales.channels.manage

requestBody.description: Fields to update on the target sales channel.

delete.description:
Deletes a sales channel identified by id.

Requires features: sales.channels.manage

requestBody.description: Identifier payload.

get.description:
Define delivery windows to communicate lead times and cut-off rules for sales orders.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

post.description:
Creates a new delivery window.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Payload describing the delivery window to create.

put.description:
Updates an existing delivery window by id.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Fields to update on the target delivery window.

delete.description:
Deletes a delivery window identified by id.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Identifier payload.

get.description:
Manage custom order line statuses available for sales documents.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

post.description:
Creates a new order line status.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Payload describing the order line status to create.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/sales/order-line-statuses" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "value": "string",
  "color": null,
  "icon": null
}'

put.description:
Updates an existing order line status by id.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Fields to update on the target order line status.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PUT "http://localhost:3000/api/sales/order-line-statuses" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "organizationId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "tenantId": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000",
  "color": null,
  "icon": null,
  "id": "00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000"
}'

delete.description:
Deletes a order line status identified by id.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

requestBody.description: Identifier payload.

get.description:
Manage the lifecycle states available for sales orders.

Requires features: sales.settings.manage

post.description:

Returns mock assignee options filtered by the optional `q` query parameter.

Creates a todo record. Supports additional custom field keys prefixed with `cf_`.

Updates an existing todo record by id. Accepts base fields and optional `cf_` custom fields.

get.description: Returns a placeholder blog record containing the provided identifier.

post.description: Echoes the provided identifier as a placeholder write endpoint.

get.description:
Returns paginated API keys visible to the current user, including per-key role assignments and organization context.

Requires features: api_keys.view

post.description:
Creates a new API key, returning the one-time secret value together with the generated key prefix and scope details.

Requires features: api_keys.create

requestBody.description: API key definition including optional scope and role assignments.

400.description: Invalid payload or missing tenant context

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/api_keys/keys" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "name": "string",
  "description": null,
  "tenantId": null,
  "organizationId": null,
  "roles": [],
  "expiresAt": null
}'

delete.description:
Removes an API key by identifier. The key must belong to the current tenant and fall within the requester organization scope.

Requires features: api_keys.delete

get.description:
Returns dictionaries accessible to the current organization, optionally including inactive records.

Requires features: dictionaries.view

post.description:
Registers a dictionary scoped to the current organization.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

requestBody.description: Dictionary definition including unique key and display name.

patch.description:
Updates the specified dictionary entry using the command bus pipeline.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

requestBody.description: Fields to update on the dictionary entry.

x-codeSamples.source:

  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "color": null,
  "icon": null
}'

delete.description:
Deletes the specified dictionary entry via the command bus.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

get.description:
Returns entries for the specified dictionary ordered alphabetically.

Requires features: dictionaries.view

post.description:
Creates a new entry in the specified dictionary.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

requestBody.description: Entry value, label, and optional presentation metadata.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/dictionaries/00000000-0000-4000-8000-000000000000/entries" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
  "value": "string",
  "color": null,
  "icon": null
}'

get.description:
Returns details for the specified dictionary, including inheritance flags.

Requires features: dictionaries.view

patch.description:
Updates mutable attributes of the dictionary. Currency dictionaries are protected from modification.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

requestBody.description: Fields to update on the dictionary.

delete.description:
Soft deletes the dictionary unless it is the protected currency dictionary.

Requires features: dictionaries.manage

bearerAuth.description: Send an `Authorization: Bearer <token>` header with a valid API token.

tags.name: Admin Dashboards
tags.description: Configurable admin dashboard with module-provided widgets.

tags.name: Authentication & Accounts
tags.description: User accounts, sessions, roles and password resets.

tags.name: Directory (Tenants & Organizations)
tags.description: Multi-tenant directory with tenants and organizations.

tags.name: Customer Relationship Management
tags.description: Core CRM capabilities for people, companies, deals, and activities.

tags.name: Table perspectives
tags.description: Shared persistence for DataTable perspectives (columns, filters, saved views).

tags.name: Custom Entities & Fields
tags.description: User-defined entities, custom fields, and dynamic records storage.

tags.name: Configuration
tags.description: Shared configuration storage and helpers for module settings.

tags.name: Query Indexes
tags.description: Hybrid query layer with full-text and vector search capabilities.

tags.name: Vector Search
tags.description: Centralized vector search index with configurable drivers.

tags.name: Audit & Action Logs
tags.description: Tracks user actions and data accesses with undo support scaffolding.

tags.name: Product Catalog
tags.description: Configurable catalog for products, variants, and pricing used by the sales module.

tags.name: Sales Management
tags.description: Quoting, ordering, fulfillment, and billing capabilities built on modular pricing and tax pipelines.

tags.name: Example Module
tags.description: Demonstrates pages, APIs, entities and DI.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: Manage access tokens for external API access.

tags.name: Shared Dictionaries
tags.description: Organization-scoped dictionaries for reusable enumerations and appearance presets.

tags.name: Content
tags.description: Static informational pages such as terms of service and privacy policy.

tags.name: Onboarding
tags.description: Self-service tenant and organization onboarding flow.

tags.name: Api Docs
tags.description: Auto-generated documentation for all HTTP endpoints.
